SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_meeting t WHERE 1 = 1
AND t.meeting_name like CONCAT('%',#{meeting.meetingName},'%')
AND t.sponsor like CONCAT('%',#{meeting.sponsor},'%')
AND t.organizer like CONCAT('%',#{meeting.organizer},'%')
AND t.status = #{meeting.status}
AND t.meeting_principal like CONCAT('%',#{meeting.meetingPrincipal},'%')
AND t.meeting_address like CONCAT('%',#{meeting.meetingAddress},'%')
mapper.update: update t_meeting set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT h.id AS hotelId, h.hotel_name, h.contact_phone, h.reception_service, h.hotel_address, h.metro_guidelines, h.hotel_principal FROM t_meeting_hotel t LEFT JOIN t_hotel h ON h.id = t.hotel_id LEFT JOIN t_meeting m ON m.id = t.meeting_id AND t.meeting_id = #{meetingId} WHERE h.deleted = 0 AND m.deleted = 0 AND t.deleted = 0 GROUP BY h.id
